pr_title: DEV-1701 - Renamed HG19 to 37 and HG38 to 38 as used for resource files

timeline.message: Renamed HG19 to HG37 as used for resource files
Dropping 'hg' from ref genome versioning and resource file directories

timeline.bodyText:
I guess the "RG" is introduced as an enum value needs to start with a letter. Is this a convention you've seen elsewhere? RG is also used as an abbreviation for Read Group.
An alternative could  be V37/V38?
timeline.author: pauldwolfe

replies.bodyText: I don't mind and am fine just leaving it as-is. Dont think Read Group is a particularly common term so no issue there.
replies.author: charlesshale

replies.bodyText: Ok I'll merge it as is and get a second opinion from Stef/Korneel.
replies.author: pauldwolfe
